nml_option.name: config_tidal_boundary_vert_levels
nml_option.description: Number of vertical levels in tidal_boundary test case. Typical values are 40 and 100.
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive integer number greater than 0.

nml_option.name: config_tidal_boundary_min_vert_levels
nml_option.description: Number of vertical levels where zstar coordinates transition to sigma.
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive integer number greater than 0.

nml_option.name: config_tidal_boundary_right_bottom_depth
nml_option.description: Depth of the bottom of the ocean in northern-most end.
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive real value greater than 0.

nml_option.name: config_tidal_start_dry
nml_option.description: Logical to determine if channel should be started dry.

nml_option.name: config_tidal_boundary_use_distances
nml_option.description: Logical to determine if channel dimensions should to specific values.

nml_option.name: config_tidal_boundary_left_value
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive real value greater than or equal to 0.

nml_option.name: config_tidal_boundary_right_value
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive real value greater than or equal to 0.

nml_option.name: config_tidal_boundary_left_bottom_depth
nml_option.description: Depth of the bottom of the ocean in southern-most end.
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive real value greater than 0.

nml_option.name: config_tidal_boundary_salinity
nml_option.description: Salinity of the water in the entire domain.

nml_option.name: config_tidal_boundary_domain_temperature
nml_option.description: Temperature of water outside of the plug.

nml_option.name: config_tidal_boundary_plug_width_frac
nml_option.description: Fraction of the domain the plug should take up initially. Only in the y direction.

nml_option.name: config_tidal_forcing_left_Cd_or_n
nml_option.description: Bottom drag of left side of the boundary.

nml_option.name: config_tidal_forcing_right_Cd_or_n
nml_option.description: Bottom drag of right side of the boundary.
